name: Impossible MegaRampTransform3D
description:
Ever imagined to ride your favorite ATV bike on a vertical longest ramp? It will be always scary, but exciting to perform stunt on extreme trail with different driving simulator vehicles. Play bike, Car, Truck & Bus multi transformation racing game.

Bigcode Games Free Games presenting you zest of driving games with amalgamation of demolition games. Transformer Impossible Mega Ramp is the number one in this genre games.
Most thrilling car and heavy vehicle stunts on impossible mega ramps are here. Finish the levels in sky high impossible race tracks to compete your friends. Don’t forget to check the leader board score to make sure you remain in the leading position after each performance on twisty tracks. Reach checkpoints in time, to transform your vehicles to the most awaiting models. Pathway ramps are designed for sports car driving to give always high performance while on racing challenge. More than 5 multi transformation checkpoints to teleport from heavy trucks to atv ride.
Remember to use fully, drift simulator while driving deep down on the road and keep paddling the acceleration to pick an extreme speed for ultimate jump off. This game is for all the crazy drivers who want to become the legends of dangerous xtreme tracks. We challenge you to participate in the modern racing against the biggest ramp ever.

Features of Transformer Impossible Mega Ramp:
Challenging ramp car sky dive
Intuitive on screen vehicle controls
Multi transformation race
Ultimate custom vehicles
Impossible air Tracks
Sky high ramps with different angles
Camera angles make game play addictive
Highly addictive ATV bike drifting game

Download Impossible Mega Ramp Transformer and play real-time transformation game from Simulation games category.
